original_text: The range of the mountains is his pasture, and he searcheth after every green thing.
korean_text: 초장 언덕으로 두루 다니며 여러 가지 푸른 풀을 찾느니라

sentences.original_text: The range of the mountains is his pasture
and he searcheth after every green thing
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 모든 푸른 것을 찾습니다
